'''Guidance of the Land of Geo''' is one of the [[Guidance of the Land]] boxes that can be obtained from purchasing the Gnostic Hymn or Gnostic Chorus packages for [[Battle Pass]].

{{See also|Philosophies of the Land of Geo}}
After reaching the prerequisite levels, collecting the box will prompt you to choose between one of the following:
{{Card|Guide to Prosperity|5|rarity=3}}
{{Card|Guide to Diligence|5|rarity=3}}
{{Card|Guide to Gold|5|rarity=3}}
